message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly lopsided split. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can adjust in the next round if you'd prefer something different.
I think a more even split is fairer. Let's go with 55/45, with me taking the larger share this time.  We can work towards a better balance in the future if needed.
I understand wanting a more even split, but I think 60/40 is a fairer compromise considering the inflation. This gives us both a decent share. Let's end this here.
